data.text: @zam85317034 We would like to inform you that, in some cases, airport taxes may be collected in addition to the passenger fare already paid. Which will depend on the flight path and conditions of the ticket And passengers can pay the airport tax at the check-in counter.

data.text: @InsomniaOOO สวัสดีค่ะ ทีมงานต้องขออภัยในความไม่สะดวกมา ณ ที่นี้ด้วยนะคะ ทีมงานขอแนะนำให้ท่านติดต่อได้ที่อีเมล FRA@thaiairways.de นะคะ

@noonchu ซึ่งกรณีการคืนเงินเงื่อนไขเป็นไปตามข้อกำหนดของบัตรโดยสารที่ท่านซื้อกับตัวแทนจำหน่าย จะต้องตรวจสอบเงื่อนไขการจองและดำเนินการผ่านตัวแทนที่ท่านออกบัตรโดยสารโดยตรง ขออภัยในความไม่สะดวกมา ณ ที่นี้ค่ะ (2/2)

@noonchu ทางทีมงานขอเรียนว่าในกรณีซื้อบัตรโดยสารผ่านทางตัวแทนจำหน่ายจะต้องติดต่อดำเนินการผ่านตัวแทนจำหน่ายนะคะ ซึ่งเราจะไม่สามารถดำเนินการแก้ไขเปลี่ยนแปลงให้ได้เนื่องด้วยเป็นการซื้อ-ขายระหว่างท่านกับตัวแทนจำหน่ายค่ะ (1/2)
@noonchu ทั้งนี้ท่านสามารถสอบถามข้อมูลเบื้องต้นได้ที่  THAI Contact Center 02-356-1111 หรือติดต่อผ่านช่องทางอีเมลได้ที่  contact@service.thaiairways.com ค่ะ (2/2)

@noonchu สวัสดีค่ะ โดยปกติแล้วหากสำรองบัตรโดยสารผ่านทางตัวแทนจำหน่าย ท่านต้องติดต่อตัวแทนจำหน่ายเพื่อดำเนินการคืนเงินค่าบัตรโดยสารค่ะ
(1/2)

@pmsambare If you have booked your ticket through an agency, you have to contact your agency who issued the tickets and completed the payment in their system. And, the travel agency will coordinate with the airlines directly for this case. We're sorry for the inconvenience.
@sachinbaweja We would like to inform you that, if you have booked your ticket through an agency, you have to contact your agency to assist you in this case.
@sachinbaweja We kindly suggest you contact your agency regarding the issue.
@Aalimnazier Once again, we are sorry for the inconvenience.
@pmsambare Greetings, may we inquire whether you had booked your ticket from an Agency or directly with Thai Airways?
@Aalimnazier Due to the high volume of requests, we seek your understanding as it may take longer than usual for us to respond to you. We apologise for any inconvenience caused.
@Demigur1 We look forward to seeing you on board. Please Stay Home for reducing the risk of getting virus and always wear masks.
@rhiannonlucyc As there are many people contacting THAI ticketing, please wait for a reply from our related department. They will reply back as soon as possible.
@rhiannonlucyc We only have THAI ticketing office of each departure city, please click https://t.co/p86rp7UJpR .
@rhiannonlucyc We suggest that you wait for a reply from our officers. We do apologize for the inconvenience.
@toadpatel We would like to inform you that, if you have booked your ticket through an agency, you have to contact your agency in order to make any alterations to your ticket. (2/2)
@toadpatel Travel Voucher for fully-unused tickets (ticket numbers starting with 217-), for travel between 31 March to 31 May 2020 (1/2)
@malissataylor Greetings, we are sorry for the inconvenience. If there are any updates on this issue, our officers will contact you as soon as possible.

@toadpatel We are truly sorry for the late response from our related department. Please be informed that, normally, the process of investigation does take some time. If there are any updates or progress towards this issue, our officers will get back to you as soon as possible.

@toadpatel In this case, we would like to inform you that, if you have booked your ticket through an agency, you have to contact your agency in order to make any alterations to your ticket. Please note that fees may be applied depending on the terms and conditions of your ticket.
@toadpatel Greetings, may we inquire whether you had booked your ticket from an Agency or directly with Thai Airways?
@lionrockgifts Thank you for choosing THAI. 💜
@Getagri92087275 Greetings, we suggest that you can visit https://t.co/ojWHcbWVWJ for more information.

The wind is rising. We must try to live. ✈️
- Paul Valéry (1871 - 1945)

Stay strong. We'll make it through.
  
#ThaiAirways #IATA #StayStrong https://t.co/ibgiwdxZkN

data.text: @ganau_raul The booking that is made by the travel agency, passengers have to contact the travel agency who issued the tickets and completed the payment in their system. And, the travel agency will coordinate with the airlines directly for this case. Sorry for the inconvenience.
@ganau_raul In this case, we would like to inform you that, if you have booked your ticket through an agency, you have to contact your agency in order to make any alterations to your ticket.

@rhiannonlucyc As we are a social media team, we cannot specify the time of each replying issue via email. In this case, we suggest you send an email again by attaching your booking number, full name, date and route, and your requirement. Sorry for the inconvenience.
@rhiannonlucyc Due to the high volume of requests, we seek your understanding as it may take longer than usual for us to respond to you. We apologize for any inconvenience caused.

@rhiannonlucyc We would like to inform you that refunds can be made by contacting any THAI ticketing office in your city of departure city at https://t.co/p86rp7UJpR. Please be informed that the possibility of a refund will depend on the terms and conditions of your ticket.

urls.title: Online Flight Booking | Flights to Thailand & More | THAI
urls.description: Thai Airways has service to 35 countries and offers online flight booking to popular domestic Thailand and International destinations.

data.text:
@vishwak We would like to recommend that you contact via email at contact@service.thaiairways.com and net.flightrsvn@thaiairways.com by informing the following information
1. Name-Surname (English)
2. Reservation Code 
3. Flights and travel dates
4. Intent

@edwina_wyn @traveloka We're sorry for the inconvenience. If you have booked your ticket through an agency, you have to contact the travel agency who issued the tickets and completed the payment in their system. They will coordinate with the airlines directly for this case.
@luis_fs21 We suggest that you contact our THAI Contact Center at +662-356-1111 (24 hours) and press 911 for English assistance or send an email to contact@service.thaiairways.com
@zwurzl09 Hello. We suggest that you contact our THAI Contact Center at +662-356-1111 (24 hours) and press 911 for English assistance or send an email to contact@service.thaiairways.com

@luis_fs21 Moreover, refunds can be made by contacting any THAI ticketing office in your city of departure city at https://t.co/p86rp7UJpR. Please be informed that the possibility of a refund will depend on the terms and conditions of your ticket.

@luis_fs21 Please be informed that we currently would like to support you by offering the following 3 options to accommodate changes to your travel plans. You can fill out the details to proceed by yourself immediately at https://t.co/K1RvRpHouj
@ndhauser We would like to inform you that as our social media team we do not have authorized to access the information. We are sorry for the inconvenience.
@ndhauser We have several classes of tickets, we suggest that you check the terms and conditions of your ticket with our THAI office.

@ndhauser We would like to inform you that it would depend on the terms and conditions of the ticket that you have purchased. Please contact our Thai Airways office in your city of departure at https://t.co/p86rp7UJpR for further information.
@ndhauser Greetings, may we inquire whether you had booked your ticket from an Agency or directly with Thai Airways?
@CamillaMilla__ Please wait for our officer to reply back to you.

@luis_fs21 We would like to inform you that the investigation process takes some time. If there are any updates, our officers will get back to you as soon as possible. We are really sorry for your inconvenience.

@LouiseNaughton @Keano_94 We would like to inform you that the investigation process takes some time. If there are any updates, our officers will get back to you as soon as possible. We are really sorry for your inconvenience.
@luis_fs21 Greetings, may we inquire whether you had booked your ticket from an Agency or directly with Thai Airways?

@nieldanny We would like to inform you that the possibility of a refund will depend on the terms and conditions of your ticket, we would like to inform you that refunds can be made by contacting any THAI ticketing office in your city of departure city at https://t.co/p86rp7UJpR
@yasameennoorian Please note that fees may be applied depending on the terms and conditions of your ticket. (2/2)

@yasameennoorian In this case, we would like to inform you that, if you have booked your ticket through an agency, you have to contact your agency in order to make any alterations to your ticket. (1/2)
@soundofreverie_ Due to the large volume of people who come in, the service waiting period may be slower than usual. We apologize for any inconvenience this opportunity may cause.
@rhyskinsella Due to the large volume of people who come in, the service waiting period may be slower than usual. We apologize for any inconvenience this opportunity may cause.

@_hugovgr Due to the high volume of requests, we are receiving via email response to yours may take some time. We're truly sorry for the inconvenience. If there're any updates, our staff will contact you as soon as possible.
@_hugovgr Please note that THAI may refuse refund application that is made later than 90 days after the expiry of e-Tickets for refundable e-Tickets.

@_hugovgr Also, additional fees may be applied. However, please be aware that the refund processing time of debit card payments may take longer than that of credit cards, as it depends on the process of the bank that had issued the debit card that you used to purchase your ticket.

@_hugovgr In this case, we would like to inform you that refunds can be made by contacting any THAI ticketing office in your city of departure city at https://t.co/p86rp7UJpR. Please be informed that the possibility of a refund will depend on the terms and conditions of your ticket. (1/2)

@Maanojthakker Greetings, we suggest that you delete your personal information for security reasons and send us via DM instead so we can keep you posted. Thank you for your patience and understanding.
